availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Winston (Louisville, Kentucky, retired police officer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, retired police officer. Kentucky native. Married to Hm Winston. Father of James Winston, Sarah Winston, Hm E. Winston, and Erasmus Winston. Retired police officer in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 1, p. 205. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007128, Louisville Deaths, p. 10.
